tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditional - Additional Qualifying Tournament Finisher or Finished 76-100 on 2014 Web.com Tour Money List
tourBios.carHigh:
2014: Finished 142nd at the Web.com Tour Q-School in December...Made 11 PGA TOUR Canada starts, with four top-25s and two top-10s, which included a T3 at the Cape Breton Classic in September. Finished 31st on the Order of Merit.

2013: Member of PGA TOUR Canada. In nine starts, made three cuts with a T5 at the ATB Financial Classic his best showing. Was 49th on the order of merit.
tourBios.personal: Previous jobs included selling Christmas trees and doing condo renovations..Lists "Saving Private Ryan" as his favorite movie and Gone With the Wind his favorite book...Favorite course played in Bethpage State Park's Black Course...Other favorites include the Montreal Canadiens...Would like to trade places with Cristiano Ronaldo for a day "to shoot like him."...Bucket list includes climbing the Everest Mountains...Speaks Korean.

tourBios.carHigh:
2015: Best outing was a T25 at the National Capital Open to Support Our Troops in Ottawa.

2014: Made eight cuts in 11 events with two top 10s and four top 25s. Started season with a T15 at the PC Financial Open in June...Three weeks later, posted a T13 at The Syncrude Boreal for a 11-under 277...At The Players Cup, finished solo eighth with rounds of 71-66-72-70...Season-best showing was a T3 at the Cape Breton Classic. Rebounded from an opening-round 72 with a final-round 65 to climb up the leaderboard 12 spots, two strokes out of a two-way playoff which Mark Silvers won.

2013: Made three cuts in nine starts, including a T5 at the ATB Financial Classic, where he earned Freedom 55 Financial Canadian Player of the Week honors. 

2012: Won the Cornwall Open...Lost in a playoff at the Atlantic City Open...Earned exempt status with rounds of 69-73-73-65 at the Fall Qualifying School. 

2011: Won the Cornwall Open. 

2010: Qualified for U.S. Open sectional qualifying and played in the RBC Canadian Open, shooting 87-65. 

2009: Qualified for U.S. Open sectional qualifying.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Finished T3 at the 2009 Canadian Junior Championship.
tourBios.personal: Became a Canadian citizen in 2013...Has worked with golf instructor Martin Whelan...Favorite golf course played is Bethpage State Park's Black Course. Course he'd most like to play is Augusta National...Favorite pro team is Manchester City, and his favorite movie is "Saving Private Ryan." ...Favorite book is Norweigan Wood. Enjoys watching figure skater Yu-Na Kim...Dream foursome would include Kim, Zlatan Ibrahimovic and Julius Caesar. Favorite quote is "Veni, vidi, vici."

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA T was T3rd in 2014 at the Cape Breton Celtic Classic presented by PC Financial.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks 89th in Par Breakers on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA TOUR Canada.
